remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型類別是與 O 的索引鍵/值組的陣列 (記錄`n`) 擷取，其中 n 是在字典中的項目數。The generic class is an array of key/value pairs with O(log `n`) retrieval, where n is the number of elements in the dictionary. 在這個中，它是類似於泛型類別。In this, it is similar to the generic class. 兩個類別都具有類似的物件模型，且兩者都有 O (記錄`n`) 擷取。The two classes have similar object models, and both have O(log `n`) retrieval. 兩個類別的不同之處是記憶體使用量和速度的插入和移除：Where the two classes differ is in memory use and speed of insertion and removal: - 使用較少的記憶體比。 uses less memory than . - 具有更快速插入和移除作業的未排序的資料，O (記錄`n`) 而不是 O (`n`) 的。 has faster insertion and removal operations for unsorted data, O(log `n`) as opposed to O(`n`) for . - 如果從已排序的資料，會同時填入此清單的速度比。If the list is populated all at once from sorted data, is faster than . 另一個差異和類別是支援有效率的索引鍵和值的集合所傳回的索引的擷取和屬性。Another difference between the and classes is that supports efficient indexed retrieval of keys and values through the collections returned by the and properties. 您不需要重新產生清單時存取屬性，因為清單是只包裝函式的內部陣列之索引鍵和值。It is not necessary to regenerate the lists when the properties are accessed, because the lists are just wrappers for the internal arrays of keys and values. 下列程式碼將示範如何使用索引擷取的已排序的清單的字串值的屬性：The following code shows the use of the property for indexed retrieval of values from a sorted list of strings: key. 每個項目可以當做擷取物件。Each element can be retrieved as a object. 索引鍵物件必須是不變的只要它們使用中索引鍵做。Key objects must be immutable as long as they are used as keys in the . 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以是，如果在清單中，值型別`TValue`，是參考型別。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the type of values in the list, `TValue`, is a reference type. 需要的比較子實作，來排序和比較。 requires a comparer implementation to sort and to perform comparisons. 預設比較子檢查索引鍵的類型是否`TKey`實作，並使用該實作，如果有的話。The default comparer checks whether the key type `TKey` implements and uses that implementation, if available. 如果沒有，檢查索引鍵的類型是否`TKey`實作。If not, checks whether the key type `TKey` implements . 如果索引鍵輸入`TKey`未實作任何一種介面，您可以指定中接受的建構函式多載實作`comparer`參數。If the key type `TKey` does not implement either interface, you can specify a implementation in a constructor overload that accepts a `comparer` parameter. 容量是項目數目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量或藉由設定屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by calling or by setting the property explicitly. 減少容量重新配置記憶體和中的所有項目複製。Decreasing the capacity reallocates memory and copies all the elements in the . 針對大型物件，您可以藉由設定增加到 64 位元系統上的 2 億元素的最大容量`enabled`屬性的組態項目`true`在執行階段環境中。For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 傳回集合中的項目類型的物件。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 之後的項目是索引鍵/值組的項目類型不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Since the elements of the are key/value pairs, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是。Instead, the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立空的 string 索引鍵，並使用具有字串方法，將某些項目。The following code example creates an empty of strings with string keys and uses the method to add some elements. 此範例示範方法會擲回時嘗試加入重複的索引鍵。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 此範例會使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 來擷取值，擊發要求的索引鍵不存在，而且可以取代顯示索引鍵關聯的值時，會擲回。The example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 該示例顯示瞭如果程序經常必須嘗試不在排序列表中的鍵值，那麼如何使用 方法作為更有效的方法來檢索值，並說明如何在調用之前使用 方法來測試鍵是否存在 方法。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the sorted list, and it shows how to use the method to test whether a key exists before calling the method. 此範例示範如何列舉的索引鍵和已排序的清單中的值以及如何列舉索引鍵和值單獨使用屬性和屬性。The example shows how to enumerate the keys and values in the sorted list and how to enumerate the keys and values alone using the property and the property. 最後，此範例示範方法。Finally, the example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一根據指定的比較子。Every key in a must be unique according to the specified comparer. 容量是項目數目，可以保存前調整大小。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold before resizing. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以評估集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個調整大小作業時新增元素至。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量或藉由設定屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by calling or by setting the property explicitly. 減少容量重新配置記憶體和中的所有項目複製。Decreasing the capacity reallocates memory and copies all the elements in the . 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立已排序的清單，5 和不區分大小寫的比較子的目前的文化特性的初始容量。The following code example creates a sorted list with an initial capacity of 5 and a case-insensitive comparer for the current culture. 此範例加入四個項目，一些小寫的索引鍵，一些具有英文大小寫的索引鍵。The example adds four elements, some with lower-case keys and some with upper-case keys. 然後此範例會嘗試新增的情況下，只有不同於現有的索引鍵的索引鍵的項目攔截產生的例外狀況，並顯示錯誤訊息。The example then attempts to add an element with a key that differs from an existing key only by case, catches the resulting exception, and displays an error message. 最後，這個範例會顯示項目不區分大小寫的排序次序。Finally, the example displays the elements in case-insensitive sort order. remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 使用內部的樹狀結構以排序順序維護的字典。The dictionary is maintained in a sorted order using an internal tree. 每個新的項目位於正確的排序位置與維護的排序次序，每當移除項目會調整樹狀目錄。Every new element is positioned at the correct sort position, and the tree is adjusted to maintain the sort order whenever an element is removed. 列舉，會維護排序順序。While enumerating, the sort order is maintained. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以是，如果在清單中，值型別`TValue`，是參考型別。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the type of values in the list, `TValue`, is a reference type. 如果當正在擷取值，未找到索引鍵就會擲回。If the key is not found when a value is being retrieved, is thrown. 如果設定值時，沒有找到索引鍵，就會加入索引鍵和值。If the key is not found when a value is being set, the key and value are added. 您也可以使用加入新項目，藉由設定機碼值的屬性不存在於; 例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中 n 是。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation, where n is . 將屬性設定為 O (記錄`n`) 作業時，如果索引鍵已存在於。Setting the property is an O(log `n`) operation if the key is already in the . 如果索引鍵不在清單中，將屬性設定為 O (`n`) 未排序的資料或 I/O 作業 (記錄`n`) 如果清單的結尾處加入新項目。If the key is not in the list, setting the property is an O(`n`) operation for unsorted data, or O(log `n`) if the new element is added at the end of the list. 如果插入會導致調整大小，作業為 O (`n`)。If insertion causes a resize, the operation is O(`n`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 來擷取值，擊發要求的索引鍵不存在，而且可以取代顯示索引鍵關聯的值時，會擲回。The following code example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 此範例也示範如何使用方法更有效率的方式來擷取值，如果程式通常必須嘗試不在已排序的清單中的索引鍵值。The example also shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the sorted list. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的索引鍵的順序中的順序相同。The order of the keys in the is the same as the order in the . 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的索引鍵是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 所傳回的集合屬性提供有效率的方式來擷取索引鍵。The collection returned by the property provides an efficient way to retrieve keys by index. 您不需要重新產生清單時在屬性經過存取時，因為清單是只包裝函式的內部陣列之索引鍵。It is not necessary to regenerate the list when the property is accessed, because the list is just a wrapper for the internal array of keys. 下列程式碼將示範如何使用索引擷取項目的已排序的清單中的 string 索引鍵的索引鍵的屬性：The following code shows the use of the property for indexed retrieval of keys from a sorted list of elements with string keys: [!code-cpp[Generic.SortedList#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedList/cpp/remarks.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.SortedList#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedList/CS/remarks.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.SortedList#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedList/VB/remarks.vb#11)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何列舉在已排序的清單中，使用金鑰屬性，以及如何列舉的索引鍵和已排序的清單中的值。The following code example shows how to enumerate the keys in the sorted list using the property, and how to enumerate the keys and values in the sorted list. 此範例也示範如何使用有效率的索引鍵的索引擷取的屬性。The example also shows how to use the property for efficient indexed retrieval of keys. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 。See . remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 屬性傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備。The property returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理的所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定這個物件時才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉已排序的清單中的索引鍵/值組`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中)，這會隱藏列舉值使用。The following code example shows how to enumerate the key/value pairs in the sorted list by using the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++), which hides the use of the enumerator. 特別是，請注意，列舉程式介面傳回物件而非物件。In particular, note that the enumerator for the interface returns objects rather than objects. 程式碼範例是完整的範例，包括針對所提供的輸出的一部分方法。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是唯讀的集合只以防止新增或移除項目; 包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`null`如果`key`是無法指派給金鑰類型的類型`TKey`的。This property returns `null` if `key` is of a type that is not assignable to the key type `TKey` of the . 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 您也可以使用屬性所設定的值不存在的索引鍵的字典; 中加入新項目，例如`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已經存在字典中，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. C# 語言使用[這](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)關鍵字定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the [this](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中 n 是。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation, where n is . 將屬性設定為 O (記錄`n`) 作業時，如果索引鍵已存在於。Setting the property is an O(log `n`) operation if the key is already in the . 如果索引鍵不在清單中，將屬性設定為 O (`n`) 未排序的資料或 I/O 作業 (記錄`n`) 如果清單的結尾處加入新項目。If the key is not in the list, setting the property is an O(`n`) operation for unsorted data, or O(log `n`) if the new element is added at the end of the list. 如果插入會導致調整大小，作業為 O (`n`)。If insertion causes a resize, the operation is O(`n`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子）介面，以及方法的屬性與不同屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property (the indexer in C#) of the interface with a , and ways the property differs from the property. 此範例示範，例如屬性，屬性可以變更現有的索引鍵相關聯的值，而且可用來加入新的索引鍵/值組，如果指定的索引鍵不是已排序的清單。The example shows that, like the property, the property can change the value associated with an existing key and can be used to add a new key/value pair if the specified key is not in the sorted list. 此範例也示範，不同於屬性，屬性不會擲回例外狀況如果`key`未在已排序的清單中，傳回 null 參考改為。The example also shows that unlike the property, the property does not throw an exception if `key` is not in the sorted list, returning a null reference instead. 最後，此範例會示範該取得屬性會傳回 null 參考，如果`key`不是正確的資料型別，並設定屬性擲回例外狀況，如果`key`不是正確的資料類型。Finally, the example demonstrates that getting the property returns a null reference if `key` is not the correct data type, and that setting the property throws an exception if `key` is not the correct data type. 程式碼範例是完整的範例，包括針對所提供的輸出的一部分方法。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the , if that number is less than 90 percent of current capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用記憶體降到最低集合的額外負荷如果沒有新的項目會加入至集合。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 重新配置及複製大型的成本相當大，但是，可能會因此方法沒有作用，如果清單是在超過容量的 90%。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 這可避免產生大型重新配置成本相對較小的改善。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要重設設為初始狀態，請呼叫方法之前先呼叫方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling method. 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 容量也可以設定使用屬性。The capacity can also be set using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結合的功能方法和屬性。This method combines the functionality of the method and the property. 如果找不到索引鍵，然後在`value`參數可取得適當的預設值為實值型別`TValue`; 例如，整數類型零 (0)`false`針對布林類型，和`null`參考類型。If the key is not found, then the `value` parameter gets the appropriate default value for the value type `TValue`; for example, zero (0) for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types. 這個方法會執行二進位搜尋。因此，這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method performs a binary search; therefore, this method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用方法更有效率的方式來擷取在程式中，經常會嘗試不在已排序的清單中的索引鍵的值。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values in a program that frequently tries keys that are not in the sorted list. 相較之下，為此範例也示範如何屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 在嘗試擷取不存在的索引鍵時，會擲回例外狀況。For contrast, the example also shows how the property (the indexer in C#) throws exceptions when attempting to retrieve nonexistent keys. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值順序中的順序相同。The order of the values in the is the same as the order in the . 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的值是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 所傳回的集合屬性提供有效率的方式來擷取依索引值。The collection returned by the property provides an efficient way to retrieve values by index. 您不需要重新產生清單時在屬性經過存取時，因為清單是只在內部陣列值的包裝函式。It is not necessary to regenerate the list when the property is accessed, because the list is just a wrapper for the internal array of values. 下列程式碼將示範如何使用索引擷取的已排序的清單的字串值的屬性：The following code shows the use of the property for indexed retrieval of values from a sorted list of strings: [!code-cpp[Generic.SortedList#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedList/cpp/remarks.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.SortedList#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedList/CS/remarks.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.SortedList#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedList/VB/remarks.vb#11)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範如何列舉的值，在已排序的清單中，使用屬性，以及如何列舉的索引鍵和已排序的清單中的值。This code example shows how to enumerate the values in the sorted list using the property, and how to enumerate the keys and values in the sorted list. 此範例也示範如何使用有效率的索引值擷取的屬性。The example also shows how to use the property for efficient indexed retrieval of values. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
